$interpreted: Sophie: Who would've thought that the beautiful New City was hiding such a secret...?
Clark: There's no way it's a coincidence that all the architecture of the city forms this pattern. There must be something going on behind the scenes.
Sophie: From what I remember, most of the citizens of the Desert Kingdom are Lizards, and they can't use Runes.
Clark: That's essentially correct. But this Rune is not the same type of Rune system that the Kingdom of the Sun uses.
Clark: I'm not sure that they're based on the same principles...
Sophie: Who would want to inlay this symbol into the city...and why?
Clark: Nope. Not even the slightest reaction...I'm not sure where to even begin...
Clark: At the Academy, I focused on Rune Items. I'm not well-versed in Runes themselves.
Clark: We could head to the Academy and ask for Headmaster Ceres' assistance, but that would take some time.
Sanchez: I've got it! Eureka! Eureka!
Sanchez: I've seen this pattern before! In Yusuf's room!
Rune: Master...Yusuf...
Sophie: You mean the priest who was murdered by those people in purple cloaks?
Sophie: Isn't Yusuf under the command of the High Priest Devious?
Sanchez: Bingo!
Sophie: I heard that the roads for New City were designed and constructed by the High Priest himself.
Clark: So you're saying...
Clark: Perhaps...it's a clue...
Sophie: Well, why don't we go to Yusuf's house and see for ourselves!
Rune: Rune will...take Sophie...
Sanchez: I'm very familiar with Yusuf's house. Let me tag along!
Clark: *sigh*...is it far...? Maria, why don't you go ahead?
Maria: Heading out, Master Clark!
Clark: ...wait a sec. Did you reboot again...?
Clark: Never thought we'd get in that easily...
Sophie: Why's it so messy in here? Must have been a thief...
Sanchez: Who's there!?
???: Soldiers!? I didn't think you'd find me here!
Clark: Huh? And you are...?
???: Well, I ain't just handing myself to you on a platter. Bring it on!!
Clark: Uhh...you're not listening at all, are you?
？？？: Ah, anyone who could find me is worthy to be...that is to say, it seems that you, chosen by fate herself, are my...archnemesis'!
Clark: One Maria is enough...I give up. Take her, Sophie.
Sophie: Eh...wait a sec.
Sophie: Umm...Mrs. Thief, I think there has been a misunderstanding.
？？？: A misunderstanding?
？？？: Are you saying...you all are──
Sophie: Who are you!?
Joan: Ah, could it be you are admirers of mine? That's right, before your very eyes is the elusive "Thief of the Gleaming Star"!
Rune: You...are the ones...who killed Master Yusuf!
Purple-Cloak: Good, everyone is present. All of you have seen the map, I presume.
Clark: How do you know about the map...?
Purple-Cloak: Kill them all! Leave no witnesses!
Sanchez: Sir! P-P-Please, this was not the deal!
Sanchez: Didn't you say we'd just scare them and stop them from snooping? You said you wouldn't hurt anyone!
Purple-Cloak: You were stupid enough to believe me? Kill them!
Joan: Wah! Fans these days are so violent? Ain't nothing scarier than love!
Sanchez: Scared the boots off me! I thought for sure we were dead...
Rune: Sanchez, did you just say "this was not the deal"...?
Sanchez: I-I-I-I was...tha-tha-that was...

Model.Text: Who would've thought that the beautiful New City was hiding such a secret...?
There's no way it's a coincidence that all the architecture of the city forms this pattern. There must be something going on behind the scenes.
From what I remember, most of the citizens of the Desert Kingdom are Lizards, and they can't use Runes.
That's essentially correct. But this Rune is not the same type of Rune system that the Kingdom of the Sun uses.
I'm not sure that they're based on the same principles...
Who would want to inlay this symbol into the city...and why?
Nope. Not even the slightest reaction...I'm not sure where to even begin...
At the Academy, I focused on Rune Items. I'm not well-versed in Runes themselves.
We could head to the Academy and ask for Headmaster Ceres' assistance, but that would take some time.
I've got it! Eureka! Eureka!
I've seen this pattern before! In Yusuf's room!
Master...Yusuf...
You mean the priest who was murdered by those people in purple cloaks?
Isn't Yusuf under the command of the High Priest Devious?
Bingo!
I heard that the roads for New City were designed and constructed by the High Priest himself.
So you're saying...
Perhaps...it's a clue...
Well, why don't we go to Yusuf's house and see for ourselves!
Rune will...take Sophie...
I'm very familiar with Yusuf's house. Let me tag along!
*sigh*...is it far...? Maria, why don't you go ahead?
Heading out, Master Clark!
...wait a sec. Did you reboot again...?
Never thought we'd get in that easily...
Why's it so messy in here? Must have been a thief...
Who's there!?
Soldiers!? I didn't think you'd find me here!
Huh? And you are...?
Well, I ain't just handing myself to you on a platter. Bring it on!!
Uhh...you're not listening at all, are you?
Ah, anyone who could find me is worthy to be...that is to say, it seems that you, chosen by fate herself, are my...archnemesis'!
One Maria is enough...I give up. Take her, Sophie.
Eh...wait a sec.
Umm...Mrs. Thief, I think there has been a misunderstanding.
A misunderstanding?
Are you saying...you all are──
Who are you!?
Ah, could it be you are admirers of mine? That's right, before your very eyes is the elusive "Thief of the Gleaming Star"!
You...are the ones...who killed Master Yusuf!
Good, everyone is present. All of you have seen the map, I presume.
How do you know about the map...?
Kill them all! Leave no witnesses!
Sir! P-P-Please, this was not the deal!
Didn't you say we'd just scare them and stop them from snooping? You said you wouldn't hurt anyone!
You were stupid enough to believe me? Kill them!
Wah! Fans these days are so violent? Ain't nothing scarier than love!
Scared the boots off me! I thought for sure we were dead...
Sanchez, did you just say "this was not the deal"...?
I-I-I-I was...tha-tha-that was...
